--------------------
Text: A whirligig is an object that spins or whirls, or has at least one part that spins or whirls.
Triplets:<whirligig
or has at least one part that spins or whirls
1:
--------------------
Text: Whirligig:  Whirligigs are also known as pinwheels, buzzers, comic weathervanes, gee-haws, spinners, whirlygigs, whirlijig, whirlyjig, whirlybird, or plain whirly.
Triplets:<whirligig
2:
--------------------
Text: Whirligig:  Whirligigs are most commonly powered by the wind but can be hand, friction, or motor powered.
Triplets:<Whirligig
3:
--------------------
Text: Whirligig:  They can be used as a kinetic garden ornament.
Triplets:<Whirligig
